title: One of the best films ever made!
review: What can ya say about a masterpiece of filmmaking?  This film is a roller coaster ride of excitement, thrills, chills, spills, explosions, fights....etc...On a scale of 1 to 10, this film is one of the rare 10's. I've seen the film well over 100 times and I'm gonna log off and watch it again.  :)
